name: Semantics
desc: A widget that annotates the widget tree with a description of the meaning of the widgets.

fields.name: properties
fields.desc: Contains properties used by assistive technologies to make the application more accessible.

fields.name: container
fields.desc: If [container] is true, this widget will introduce a new node in the semantics tree. Otherwise, the semantics will be merged with the semantics of any ancestors (if the ancestor allows that).

fields.name: explicitChildNodes
fields.desc: Whether descendants of this widget are allowed to add semantic information to the [SemanticsNode] annotated by this widget.

fields.name: excludeSemantics
fields.desc: Whether to replace all child semantics with this node.

fields.name: blockUserActions
fields.desc: Whether to block user interactions for the rendering subtree.
